version_description:
Share your beggar now to win iTunes gift cards!

- Added option to share your beggar
- New clothes
- Raised the max level to 50
- Ability to rename workers

- You can now buy a Private Jet
- New minigame: Virtual-Stack
- International shirts including: USA, Canada, Brazil, UK, Germany, Finland, Sweden, Russia, Australia and Singapore
- Fixed the Xp Boost power-up
- Bug fixes

- New minigame: "Spin 2 Win!"
- There's no more letter-limit in BegChat and you can scroll down to see previous messages
- Improved tutorial
- Bug fixes

We're releasing a major update soon! Stay tuned!

- Multitouch support while throwing coins
- Bug fixes

We're releasing a major update soon! Stay tuned!

THE BIG UPDATE IS FINALLY HERE!!

CHANGE ON TOUR
- Now you can hire other beggars to beg money for you!
Expand your territory and build your group of beggars. Load the bus with beggars and send them to beg money into four different locations.

THE ULTIMATE DONATION
- Donate your fortune to cause of your choice and start all over again. By doing this,
you'll receive unique benefits to your fresh start. You can only keep your Virtual Cards, businessmen and golden animals.

BALANCE UPDATE
- The game is now more fast-paced and balanced.
Especially, you'll get much more money by throwing and begging coins.
Power-ups are more efficient and in exchange they'll last less time.
Workers will make slightly more money with fewer working hours and high-endurance workers are now even better.

AND EVEN MORE
- Day-Night cycle
- Increased the max level to 55
- New clothes
- New stats, leaderboards and achievements
- Improved tutorial
- Graphical improvements
- New random events and secrets

2.01:
- Bug fixes

2.0:
THE BIG UPDATE IS HERE!!

CHANGE ON TOUR
- Now you can hire other beggars to beg money for you!
Expand your territory and build your group of beggars. Load the bus with beggars and send them to beg money into four different locations.

THE ULTIMATE DONATION
- Donate your fortune to cause of your choice and start all over again. By doing this,
you'll receive unique benefits to your fresh start. You can only keep your Virtual Cards, businessmen and golden animals.

BALANCE UPDATE
- The game is now more fast-paced and balanced.
Especially, you'll get much more money by throwing and begging coins.
Power-ups are more efficient and in exchange they'll last less time.
Workers will make slightly more money with fewer working hours and high-endurance workers are now even better.

AND EVEN MORE
- Day-Night cycle
- Increased the max level to 55
- New clothes
- New stats, leaderboards and achievements
- Improved tutorial
- Graphical improvements
- New random events and secrets

What's new in 2.5:

GARAGE
- Get your own garage and decorate it as you like; buy cars, aquariums, swimming pools and much more. Make it the coolest garage around!
- Drive your car to gain some extra xp
- Invite other players from begchat to your garage

MORE
- Skipping workers' work task now gives them xp
- You'll now keep your bus crew after the Ultimate Donation
- Graphical improvements
- Begchat improvements
- Minor balance updates

2.51:
- Balance improvements
- Minor bug fixes

2.5:
GARAGE
- Get your own garage and decorate it as you like; buy cars, aquariums, swimming pools and much more. Make it the coolest garage around!
- Drive your car to gain some extra xp
- Invite other players from begchat to your garage

MORE
- Skipping workers' work task now gives them xp
- You'll now keep your bus crew after the Ultimate Donation
- Graphical improvements
- Begchat improvements

2.52 and 2.51:
- Balance improvements
- Minor bug fixes

2.5:
GARAGE
- Get your own garage and decorate it as you like; buy cars, aquariums, swimming pools and much more. Make it the coolest garage around!
- Drive your car to gain some extra xp
- Invite other players from begchat to your garage

MORE
- Skipping workers' work task now gives them xp
- You'll now keep your bus crew after the Ultimate Donation
- Graphical improvements
- Begchat improvements

HUGE UPDATE 3.0!!

BRAND-NEW TASKS
- Completely new main task-system
- Side tasks are now given by passers-by

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS
- Add your friends to the game
- Gift them something, and they might gift you back
- Watch them progress and check out their garages

RENEWED ULTIMATE DONATION
- You can now choose multiple donation targets, and the boosts from them are enhanced
- Large xp-boost after every donation.
- Maximum level is now 99.

LOTS OF NEW UNLOCKABLES
- Three brand-new places: Skyscraper, Private Island and Space Center
- Many different furniture and clothing items
- New worker: Politician
- Tons of new upgrades

AND MORE
- Additional BegChat features
- The game is now more fast-paced and balanced
- Graphical improvements

- Minor bug fixes

- Skin colors
- New place: Mars
- New worker: Pilot
- Golden workers: these workers will be kept after the ultimate donation
- You can now buy paintings to your garage
- New tasks and unlocks
- Ultimate donation badges
- Motivator Mike upgrades
- Game balancing and bug fixes
